channel.title: Vengeance, and Vengeance REBOUND
channel.description: Ok, I have the model and gfx for vengeance, now how do I add it to the Ghorrock Teleport Slot, and also if you can help with this too, how would I make it so the vengeance hits damage the next time your opponent hits you, instead of hitting damage right away as you cast?

item.title: Vengeance, and Vengeance REBOUND
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
